mapper.select: select w.wine_no, w.wine_name, w.wine_type, w.wine_country, w.reg_date, d.wine_price, d.wine_stock, d.wine_image from wine w, wine_description d where w.wine_no = d.wine_no(+) order by w.reg_date desc

select w.wine_no, w.wine_name, w.wine_type, w.wine_country, w.reg_date, d.wine_price, d.wine_stock, d.wine_image from wine w, wine_description d where w.wine_no = d.wine_no(+)
AND w.wine_type = 1
AND w.wine_type = 2
AND w.wine_type = 3
order by w.reg_date desc
